question: Which two countries are fought against each other in the "Beaver Wars"?
explanation: Beaver Wars, also known as Iroquois Wars or the French and Iroquois Wars, was a series of conflicts fought intermittently from 1609 to 1701 in the Great Lakes region in North America. They were battles for economic welfare throughout the Saint Lawrence River valley in Canada and the lower Great Lakes region which pitted the Iroquois, supported by Great Britain, against the northern Algonquians and the Algonquians French allies supported by France.
